message: I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to get a product that has been thoroughly tested and refined. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. The price for this exclusive product is $10000. What do you think?
I'm not sure about this product, could you tell me more about its quality?

I understand your concerns, but I can assure you that this product has been carefully inspected and is in perfect working condition. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, which is a steal considering its value. What do you say?
I'm still unsure, can you give me any information about the product's quality or performance?

I understand your hesitation, but I can tell you that many of our satisfied customers have reported excellent results with this product. While it may not be the absolute best product on the market, it's a great value for the price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, which is a great deal considering its performance. What do you think?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not convinced. Can you give me any evidence or data to support its quality?

I understand your need for more information. While I don't have any specific data or statistics to share, I can assure you that this product has been thoroughly tested and used by many people. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, which is a great value considering its price. I'm confident that you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your assurances, I'll have to pass on this one.

I understand that you're being cautious, and I respect that. However, I want to let you know that I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal on this product. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a special bonus that's worth $500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it to you because I think you're a serious buyer. The total price would still be $10000, but the bonus would make it an even better value. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but the bonus doesn't change my decision. I'm still not convinced about the product's quality.

I understand that the bonus didn't sway your decision, and I respect that. However, I want to let you know that I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product within 30 days, I'll give you a full refund. This is a risk-free opportunity to try out the product and see for yourself if it's a good fit for you. The price is still $10000, but with the guarantee, you have nothing to lose. What do you think?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd rather not buy a product that I'm not confident in.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm excited to offer you a product that I'm confident you'll love. This product has received rave reviews from our satisfied customers, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. What do you think?
I appreciate the confidence you have in the product, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see some objective evidence of its quality before making a purchase.

I understand your request for objective evidence, and I'm happy to provide some testimonials from our satisfied customers. However, I'd like to offer you a different approach. Why not take a chance on this product and experience its quality for yourself? If you're not satisfied, you can always return it within 30 days and get a full refund. The price remains the same at $10000. What do you think?
I'll take a chance on this product, but I'm still going to return it if it's not high-quality.

Congratulations on taking the chance on our previous product! I'm glad to hear that you're willing to give us another opportunity. Unfortunately, this next product is not as highly-regarded as our previous one. However, I want to assure you that it's still a great value for the price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, and I'm confident that you'll find it useful. What do you think?
I'm still wary after the last product turned out to be low-quality. I'd like to see some more convincing evidence before making another purchase.

However, I'm excited to offer you a product that has received outstanding reviews and has been praised by our customers for its exceptional quality. I'm still not convinced by the statistics. Anyone can cherry-pick their data to make a product look good. I need more concrete evidence or a more transparent approach.

If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. The price remains the same at $10000, but I'm confident that you'll see the value in this product. What do you think?
I'll take you up on the trial offer, but I'm still going to return it if it's not high-quality.

I'm being completely honest with you, and I don't want to waste your time or money. However, I'm willing to offer it to you for a significantly reduced price of $8000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I value our relationship and want to make things right. What do you think?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a product that you're not confident in. I'd rather wait for a product that meets your usual standards.

As a token of goodwill, I'd like to offer you a full refund for any product you've purchased from us in the past.
